trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>就會引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>類別時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>繪製和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class contains all the information needed to paint the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the ToolTip text, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>類別包含需要繪製的所有資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>，包括工具提示文字， <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>，而<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件上應該執行繪圖。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to perform your customized drawing.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂工具提示的查詢，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>來決定的工具提示中，界限和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件來執行自訂的繪圖。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以增加的界限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>處理顯示之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DrawToolTipEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 DrawToolTipEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
